page.title: 12BROUGHTON C.P. SCHOOL
page.content: THERE ARE FIVE CLASSES.THE TEACHERS ARE MRS KIRK,MRS LETTS,MR HENDERSON,MRS HEATHCOTE AND MR TEASDALE.MR DOE IS THE HEAD TEACHER.MRS COLLIER,MRS KEMP AND MRS GREEN ARE THE DINNER LADIES.MRS LUDLOW AND MRS FRANKLIN GIVE OUT THE DINNERS. MRS BUTLER HELPS CLASS ONE.MRS CHAMBERS IS THE SCHOOL SECRETARY.THE CLUBS ARE CHESS,WATCH AND GYM. MR JOYCE IS THE SCHOOL CARETAKER AND MRS.HOUGHTON HELPS HIM.MOST OF THE CHILDREN LIKE SWIMMING BEST.THEY DO NOT LIKE MATHS.MOST CHILDREN LIKE SAUSAGE,CHIPS AND BEANS MOST.CLASS 5 HAS GOT 31 CHILDREN,CLASS 4 HAS GOT 29 CHILDREN,CLASS 3 HAS GOT 25 CHILDREN,CLASS 2 HAS GOT 25 CHILDREN AND CLASS 1 HAS GOT 25 CHILDREN.THE CHILDREN LIKE THE SCHOOL VERY MUCH. THERE ARE 21 NEW CHILDREN STARTING IN THE AUTUMN TERM.
